entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
